english.gl: Learn Graphic Design , All I need to know in one place
english.carestory: During my period of learning graphic design, I worked at Nature Care. I designed dozens of social media advertising posts related to medications. This practical application of what I learned helped me increase my learning speed and enhance my design skills. ğŸ¨ğŸŒ¿
english.tiastory: I also worked at a wooden gift manufacturing company owned by one of my friends. The work primarily involved retouching flaws in customer-submitted images and manipulating colors to match the piece. Occasionally, I added elements to the image based on customer requests. I worked there for approximately 6 months, during which my skills in image manipulation and editing grew significantly. I learned various new techniques for image manipulation. The work pressure during this period also increased my efficiency in handling different design tools and heightened my awareness of customer interactions. ğŸ¨ğŸ
english.free1: - Collaborated with over six clients from various Arab countries.
english.free2: - Ensured client satisfaction and built strong working relationships.
english.free3: - Adapted to different client preferences and cultural contexts.
english.free4: - Developed effective communication skills while working remotely.
english.free5: - Designed more than a hundred diverse and innovative graphics for social media Advertising.
english.free6: - I designed the logo and user interface for the Sharia Academy website in Kuwait, as well as some social media posts.
english.free7: - I worked with Fluorite, a company that manufactures and sells furniture, home furnishings, and doors in Saudi Arabia, creating an average of 30 designs per month.
english.free8: - I worked with La Chapa, an American food restaurant in Saudi Arabia, creating an average of 30 designs per month.
english.free9: - I designed the logo and visual identity for Constraction Model Company in Saudi Arabia.
english.free10: - I designed the logo and visual identity for Mykom, a mineral water distribution company in the UAE.
english.free11: - I designed social media posts for the Quran Memorization Charity Association.
english.free12: - I designed several social media posts for Dithar, a company that sells abayas in Saudi Arabia.
english.free13: - I designed several posts for Fitness Home Club in Saudi Arabia.
english.free14: - I designed several posts for Diamond Fitness Club in Saudi Arabia.
english.free15: - I designed various print materials and social media posts for Al-Barie Academy for Sports in Saudi Arabia.
english.free16: - I designed several Snapchat ads for Hedra and Qosura, companies that sell sandals in Saudi Arabia.
english.free17: - I designed a post for New Care Medical Center in Saudi Arabia for the 91st National Day.
english.free18: - I designed several posts for Mostasharoon Medical Rehabilitation Center in Saudi Arabia.
english.free19: - I designed several social media posts for Ajwa Al-Sahab, a tourism and travel company in Saudi Arabia.
english.free20: - I designed a banner ad for RYOF Perfume store in Saudi Arabia.
english.free21: - I designed several social media posts for Life Laundry, a laundry service company in Saudi Arabia.
english.free22: - I designed various print materials and social media posts for Oxford Elite Academy in the UK.
english.free23: - I designed a logo for Haya.Dev, a web developer in Syria.
english.name: Adnan Mamo
english.story: work as a freelancer, and I'm passionate about my work. I've been in the field of graphic design for three years, collaborating with over six clients from various Arab countries. I've successfully completed more than a hundred diverse and innovative designs, earning the satisfaction and trust of all my clients. I enjoy working as part of a team and communicate effectively with others. My aspirations include becoming a creative graphic designer and a skilled programmer. I also aim to start a profitable side project that reflects my passion for design. I'm a calm, analytical, and organized individual who enjoys making new friends. My hobbies include running, weightlifting, training, and, of course design. ğŸ¨ğŸƒâ€â™‚ï¸ğŸ’ªğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’».
